about_the_game:
As the Space War have ended, your planet has been devastated in a ruinied galaxy. As a robotics engineer and leader of a planetary defense force, you must fend off intruders and robot debris from space. There are no companions to help you, but with music, no problem! Save your planet!

【Cooldown】 is a rhythm-defense game set in the future.
Players must defend their planet by destroying intruders and debris using eight turrets.
After attacking with the turret, there is a cooldown amount of time before you can attack again, and the cooldown is related to the beat of the background music you will hear.
Therefore, if you attack in time to the beat, you will be able to perform the attack most efficiently.
Strengthen your turret, develop various skills, and defend the planet with fellow robots!

Features

  • Attack or use items from 8 turrets with intuitive keyboard buttons!
  • One song, one stage!
  • Enhance various abilities at the end of the stage!
  • Record and play your own songs to earn extra rewards!
